LanguageData.VRE_LongPregnancy.label: long pregnancy
LanguageData.VRE_LongPregnancy.description: Carriers of this gene take twice as long to develop a child during pregnancy. Pregnancy lasts three hexamesters - 36 days.
LanguageData.VRE_ShortPregnancy.label: short pregnancy
LanguageData.VRE_ShortPregnancy.description: Carriers of this gene develop a child during pregnancy much faster. Pregnancy lasts 3 bimesters - 12 days.
